title: WHAT IN THE FCUK

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: obviously im connected to the internet.... anyone else getting this?

replies.body: This was most likely caused by an external network issue that affected a few of our services for a short span of time. This issue has since been resolved and our services are working fine now. Let me know if you're still experiencing this.
I am likewise getting this error periodically when I go to start game but I log in fine.
You're lucky... at least you got to log in and see the game.  I can't get past the RADS Error dialogue box when I try to launch the client! {{item:3070}}
I've been logged into the client for a few hours and it just kicked me off as well. This isn't an issue with login. This is an issue with connection between all of us and League's server's.

> [{quoted}](name=RabblerouserGT,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mXyeaEFe,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-12-01T20:40:10.198+0000)
>
> I've been logged into the client for a few hours and it just kicked me off as well. This isn't an issue with login. This is an issue with connection between all of us and League's server's.

ITS ALIENS THEY ARE COMING FOR US ALL BE PREPARED PEOPLE OPEN YOUR EYES.
dude, there are like 30 other posts of it posted 10 minutes before you- just read before you post
Motherfucker, this shit is back again.
